channel.title: Talks By Gene R. Cook
channel.description: General Conference talks by Gene R. Cook.

item.title: Let All Thy Doings Be unto the Lord
item.description: That’s a long, long walk. My brothers and sisters, my heart is full. I believe more than anything else I would like to truly express my love for my Father in heaven. I thought this morning of my wife as she said to me early, “Are you ready for today?

item.title: Are You a Member Missionary?
item.description: My brothers and sisters, the Lord has greatly blessed the proceedings of this conference. You have heard the Brethren speak by the power of the Holy Ghost, and if you were listening by that Spirit you have been edified and strengthened in your resolv

item.title: Seek Out Your Spiritual Leader
item.description: Several months ago while traveling by air in the Andes area, I had the opportunity to explain to the man sitting next to me why I was living in South America.

item.title: Miracles among the Lamanites
item.description: Why should that be so? Why are changes in that people occurring so dramatically? The title page of the record their ancestors gave to the world, entitled the Book of Mormon, indicates that the book was “written to the Lamanites, who are a remnant of

item.title: Spiritual Guides for Teachers of Righteousness
item.description: Last summer on a lonely stretch of desert highway, we saw ahead what appeared to be the road covered with water. My children would have wagered their entire savings on that fact. But within a few minutes we were at the distant spot and saw not one dr

item.title: Home and Family: A Divine Eternal Pattern
item.description: Thank you, Sister Smith, from all the sisters of the Church, and certainly all the brethren as well. We appreciate your service and that of Sister Cannon.

item.title: Inviting Others to “Come unto Christ”
item.description: Dear brethren of the priesthood, I greet you this evening in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ with the sacred injunction, “Come unto Christ.” (.)

item.title: Receiving Divine Assistance through the Grace of the Lord
item.description: My dear brothers and sisters, I bear witness this afternoon of the divinity of the Lord Jesus Christ and specifically of the doctrine of grace that He extends to all mankind. (See .) In so doing, I humbly recognize the great gift the Father has besto

item.title: Charity: Perfect and Everlasting Love
item.description: As we increasingly think and act like Him, the attributes of the natural man will slip away to be replaced by the heart and the mind of Christ.
